lyrics:
3 contributorstrying lyricsverse 1
could you let down your hair be transparent for awhile
just a little while
to see if youre human after all
honesty is a hard attribute to find
when we all want to seem like
weve got it all figured out
well let me be the first to say that i dont have a clue
i dont have all the answers
aint going to pretend like i do

chorus
just trying to find my way
trying to find my way the best i know how

verse 2
well i havent memorized all of the cute things to say
but im working on it
maybe ill master this art form someday
if i quote all the lines off the top of my head
would you believe
that i fully understand all these things ive read

chorus
just trying to find my way
trying to find my way the best i know how
you might also likebridge
well i havent got it all figured out quite yet but
even if it takes my whole life to get to where i need to be
and if i should fall to the bottom of the end
ill be one step back to you and

chorus
im trying to find my way
trying to find my way

im trying to find my way
trying to find my wayembed
